3.title: Top decrease in value
3.query:
fetch bizevents|filter event.provider == "www.easytrade.com"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.withdraw-money" or event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit-money"
| fieldsAdd amount_withdrawal = if(event.type=="com.easytrade.withdraw-money", toDouble(amount), else:0.0)
| fieldsAdd amount_deposit = if(event.type=="com.easytrade.deposit-money", toDouble(amount), else:0.0)
| summarize total_withdrawals = sum(amount_withdrawal), total_deposits = sum(amount_deposit), by:{accountId}
| fieldsAdd balanceChange = round(total_deposits - total_withdrawals,decimals:2)
| filter balanceChange < 0.0
| fields accountId, balanceChange
| sort balanceChange, direction:"ascending"
| limit 5

4.title: Most recent buy trades
4.query:
fetch bizevents, from:now()-30m
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.buy-assets"
| parse event.type, "'com.easytrade.' ALPHA:tradeType"
| fields timestamp, accountId, tradeType, amount, price = round(price, decimals:2), tradeVolume = round(amount * price, decimals:2)
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| limit 5

5.title: Buy
5.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.buy-assets"
| summarize Total = count()

6.title: Sell
6.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.sell-assets"
| summarize Total = count()

7.title: Buy (Total)
7.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.buy-assets"
| summarize Dollars =  round(sum(toDouble(amount)*toDouble(price)))

8.title: Sell  (Total)
8.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.sell-assets"
| summarize Dollars =  round(sum(toDouble(amount)*toDouble(price)))

9.title: Buy (Avg)
9.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.buy-assets"
| summarize dollars =  round(avg(toDouble(amount)*toDouble(price)),decimals:2)

10.title: Sell (Avg)
10.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.sell-assets"
| summarize dollars =  round(avg(toDouble(amount)*toDouble(price)),decimals:2)

11.title: Trades by type

12.title: Volume by trade type (Total)
12.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.sell-assets" or event.type == "com.easytrade.buy-assets"
| fieldsAdd buyTotal = if((event.type == "com.easytrade.buy-assets"),(toDouble(amount)*toDouble(price)))
| fieldsAdd sellTotal = if((event.type == "com.easytrade.sell-assets"),(toDouble(amount)*toDouble(price)))
| summarize buy = sum(toDouble(buyTotal)), sell = sum(toDouble(sellTotal)), by:{bin(timestamp, 15m), alias:{timestamp}}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"

13.title: Volume by trade type (Avg)
13.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.sell-assets" or event.type == "com.easytrade.buy-assets"
| fieldsAdd buyTotal = if((event.type == "com.easytrade.buy-assets"),(toDouble(amount)*toDouble(price)))
| fieldsAdd sellTotal = if((event.type == "com.easytrade.sell-assets"),(toDouble(amount)*toDouble(price)))
| summarize buy = avg(toDouble(buyTotal)), sell = avg(toDouble(sellTotal)), by:{bin(timestamp, 15m), alias:{timestamp}}
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"

16.title: Time from deposit to first buy
16.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "www.easytrade.com"
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.buy-assets" OR event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit-money"
| fieldsAdd deposit_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit-money", toLong(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd buy_asset_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.buy-assets", toLong(timestamp))
| summarize first_deposit_ts = takeFirst(deposit_ts), first_buy_asset_ts = takeFirst(buy_asset_ts), by:{accountId}
| fieldsAdd time_from_deposit_to_first_buy = (first_buy_asset_ts - first_deposit_ts)/(1000000000.0)
| filter time_from_deposit_to_first_buy > 5
| limit 5
| fields accountId, time_from_deposit_to_first_buy, alias:{seconds} 
| sort seconds desc

21.title: Avg Time
21.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "frontendreverseproxy-easytrade"
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.start" or event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.finish" or event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.start" or event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.finish"
| fieldsAdd buy_raw_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.start", (timestamp))
| fieldsAdd buy_start_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.start", toLong(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd buy_finish_ts = if((event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.finish" and status == "finished"), toLong(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd sell_raw_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.start", (timestamp))
| fieldsAdd sell_start_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.start", toLong(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd sell_finish_ts = if((event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.finish" and status == "finished"), toLong(timestamp))
| summarize first_buy_raw_ts = takefirst(buy_raw_ts), first_buy_start_ts = takeFirst(buy_start_ts), first_buy_finish_ts = takeFirst(buy_finish_ts), first_sell_raw_ts = takefirst(sell_raw_ts), first_sell_start_ts = takeFirst(sell_start_ts), first_sell_finish_ts = takeFirst(sell_finish_ts), by:{dt.rum.session.id}
| fieldsAdd time_buy_from_start_to_finish = (first_buy_finish_ts - first_buy_start_ts)/(1000000000.0)
| fieldsAdd time_sell_from_start_to_finish = (first_sell_finish_ts - first_sell_start_ts)/(1000000000.0)
| filter time_buy_from_start_to_finish > 0 or time_sell_from_start_to_finish > 0
| fieldsAdd time = if(isNotNull(time_buy_from_start_to_finish), (first_buy_raw_ts), else:(first_sell_raw_ts))
| summarize buy = avg(time_buy_from_start_to_finish), sell = avg(time_sell_from_start_to_finish), by:{bin(time, 15m),alias:{timestamp}}
| sort timestamp desc

22.title: Buy (Avg Time)
22.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "frontendreverseproxy-easytrade"
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.start" or event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.finish" 
| fieldsAdd buy_raw_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.start", (timestamp))
| fieldsAdd buy_start_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.start", toLong(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd buy_finish_ts = if((event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.finish" and status == "finished"), toLong(timestamp))
| summarize first_buy_raw_ts = takefirst(buy_raw_ts), first_buy_start_ts = takeFirst(buy_start_ts), first_buy_finish_ts = takeFirst(buy_finish_ts), by:{dt.rum.session.id}
| fieldsAdd time_buy_from_start_to_finish = (first_buy_finish_ts - first_buy_start_ts)/(1000000000.0)
| filter time_buy_from_start_to_finish > 0
| summarize buy = round(avg(time_buy_from_start_to_finish),decimals:2)

23.title: Sell  (Avg Time)
23.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "frontendreverseproxy-easytrade"
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.start" or event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.finish" 
| fieldsAdd sell_raw_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.start", (timestamp))
| fieldsAdd sell_start_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.start", toLong(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd sell_finish_ts = if((event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.finish" and status == "finished"), toLong(timestamp))
| summarize first_sell_raw_ts = takefirst(sell_raw_ts), first_sell_start_ts = takeFirst(sell_start_ts), first_sell_finish_ts = takeFirst(sell_finish_ts), by:{dt.rum.session.id}
| fieldsAdd time_sell_from_start_to_finish = (first_sell_finish_ts - first_sell_start_ts)/(1000000000.0)
| filter time_sell_from_start_to_finish > 0
| summarize sell = round(avg(time_sell_from_start_to_finish),decimals:2)

24.title: Time from deposit to first sell
24.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "www.easytrade.com"
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.sell-assets" OR event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit-money"
| fieldsAdd deposit_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit-money", toLong(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd sell_asset_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.sell-assets", toLong(timestamp))
| summarize first_deposit_ts = takeFirst(deposit_ts), first_sell_asset_ts = takeFirst(sell_asset_ts), by:{accountId}
| fieldsAdd time_from_deposit_to_first_sell = (first_sell_asset_ts - first_deposit_ts)/(1000000000.0)
| filter time_from_deposit_to_first_sell > 5
| limit 5
| fields accountId, time_from_deposit_to_first_sell, alias:{seconds} 
| sort seconds desc

25.query:

| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.sell-assets"
| parse event.type, "'com.easytrade.' ALPHA:tradeType"
| fields timestamp, accountId, tradeType, amount, price = round(price, decimals:2), tradeVolume = round(amount * price, decimals:2)
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| limit 5

26.title: Top increase in value
26.query:
fetch bizevents|filter event.provider == "www.easytrade.com"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.withdraw-money" or event.type == "com.easytrade.deposit-money"
| fieldsAdd amount_withdrawal = if(event.type=="com.easytrade.withdraw-money", toDouble(amount), else:0.0)
| fieldsAdd amount_deposit = if(event.type=="com.easytrade.deposit-money", toDouble(amount), else:0.0)
| summarize total_withdrawals = sum(amount_withdrawal), total_deposits = sum(amount_deposit), by:{accountId}
| fieldsAdd balanceChange = round(total_deposits - total_withdrawals,decimals:2)
| filter balanceChange > 0.0
| fields accountId, balanceChange
| sort balanceChange, direction:"descending"
| limit 5

28.title: Buy SLA status
28.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "frontendreverseproxy-easytrade"
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.start" or event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.finish"
| fieldsAdd buy_raw_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.start", (timestamp))
| fieldsAdd buy_start_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.start", toLong(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd buy_finish_ts = if((event.type == "com.easytrade.buy.finish" and status == "finished"), toLong(timestamp))
| summarize first_buy_raw_ts = takefirst(buy_raw_ts),first_buy_start_ts = takeFirst(buy_start_ts), first_buy_finish_ts = takeFirst(buy_finish_ts), by:{dt.rum.session.id}
| fieldsAdd time_from_start_to_finish = (first_buy_finish_ts - first_buy_start_ts)/(1000000000.0)
| filter time_from_start_to_finish >= 0
| fieldsAdd sla = if(time_from_start_to_finish >= 3, "NotMet", else: "Met")
| fields first_buy_raw_ts, alias:{timestamp}, sla
| summarize slaPercentage=round(toDouble(countIf(sla == "Met"))/toDouble(Count()) * 100,decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd slaStatus = if(slaPercentage <= 95, "NotMet ❌ ", else:"Met ✅ ")

30.title: Sell SLA status
30.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == "frontendreverseproxy-easytrade"
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| filter event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.start" or event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.finish"
| fieldsAdd sell_raw_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.start", (timestamp))
| fieldsAdd sell_start_ts = if(event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.start", toLong(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd sell_finish_ts = if((event.type == "com.easytrade.sell.finish" and status == "finished"), toLong(timestamp))
| summarize first_sell_raw_ts = takefirst(sell_raw_ts), first_sell_start_ts = takeFirst(sell_start_ts), first_sell_finish_ts = takeFirst(sell_finish_ts), by:{dt.rum.session.id}
| fieldsAdd time_from_start_to_finish = (first_sell_finish_ts - first_sell_start_ts)/(1000000000.0)
| filter time_from_start_to_finish >= 0
| fieldsAdd sla = if(time_from_start_to_finish >= 3, "NotMet", else: "Met")
| fields first_sell_raw_ts, alias:{timestamp}, sla
| summarize slaStatus = count(), by:{bin(timestamp, 15m),alias:{timestamp},sla}
| sort timestamp desc
